profile:
Purchasing a home is potentially the biggest investment of your life. We are here to help you at any point in that process and after. We support you – home buyers, sellers, real estate investors, realtors by inspecting, evaluating, and reporting precisely about the condition of your potential home and investment. We are highly professional and work purely in your interest.
We have a reputation for being thorough because you deserve to know all there is to know when buying or selling your home in Halifax, NS.

If your preference is an in-depth, accurate, valuable home inspection service by a professional home inspector at a reasonable price, then you have found the right company and we would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Home Inspector Andrew Buchanan

Andrew started his career in financial services, helping and serving  customers and has a passion for customer service. He says he quickly realized that his true passion was for real estate - design, 
property management, renovations, construction and home maintenance.  Having completed the Nova Scotia Realty course in 2009, and after many years of owning a full service Property Management company and working on numerous construction projects from old to new, volunteering with Habit for Humanity since 2007 and dedicating his spare time to these pursuits and experiencing first-hand the significance of receiving top notch home advice, it became very clear Andrew had a passion for home inspection services. He decided to venture into this business and says he has now ‘become the home inspector he’d always wished he had!’

His personal goal as the Canadian Residential Inspection Services home inspector for Halifax/Dartmouth is to provide clients with amazing unmatched service satisfaction, an enjoyment of the buying process, a learning opportunity, high quality defect recognition, reliable, and comprehensive information to assist them in making those ever important decisions that come with owning a home. He specializes in translating technical information into practical terms so that his customers receive not just a comprehensive report, but also a clearer understanding of what they need to know when buying a home and how to protect such a huge investment after the sale finalizes.  Andrew's customers describe him as "customer centric, knowledgable, thorough, friendly, professional, and with a knack for explaining things in a way that's really easy to understand."

Canadian Residential Inspection Services raises the bar in the home inspection industry when it comes to professionalism, code of ethics and conduct. All our inspectors receive intensive training and on-going support to ensure you receive a thorough, unbiased, professional inspection. Canadian Residential Inspection Services has the most user-friendly, comprehensive reporting system in the industry.
name: Canadian Residential Inspection Services Ltd
